alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Northern Stillwater (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Stillwater and southeastern Golden Valley Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 430 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Ryegate to near Columbus. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lavina, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Hailstone Wildlife Refuge, Rapelje and Molt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
